oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Prevalence of respiratory pathogens and diseases in dairy heifers at two different moments in their preweaning period
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Denis-Robichaud, José
Tremblay Cléroux, Marie-Ève
Buczinski, Sébastien
Gauthier, Marie-Lou
Dubuc, Jocelyn
Francoz, David
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: dairy heifers
respiratory pathogens
preweaning
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The health of pre-weaned dairy heifers is crucial for the future of a herd. Understanding the dynamic of diseases and pathogens affecting heifers can help farmers and veterinarians to choose management and prevention practices. The objective of this study was to quantify and compare the prevalence of respiratory pathogens and diseases at two moments during their preweaning period.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2021 Annual Conference Proceedings; 250
